I am 5'1" and 115 lbs., with a very short torso.  This camo crop top fits me perfectly and looks amazing with my olive green, high-waisted activewear leggings.  The hem almost meets the top of my leggings, with just a sliver of skin showing.  It is not too tight.  I have some wiggle room.  It's made of a shiny, nylon material.
